## internal-plugin-ediscovery package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [EdiscoveryError](./internal-plugin-ediscovery.ediscoveryerror.md) | General ediscovery error |
|  [InvalidEmailAddressError](./internal-plugin-ediscovery.invalidemailaddresserror.md) | InvalidEmailAddressError is thrown when an email address has been supplied as a parameter and cannot be found in CI |
|  [ReportRequest](./internal-plugin-ediscovery.reportrequest.md) | Creates a report request object with a specific set of search parameters |
